title: Co-operative learning: from 'me' to 'we'
creator_credit: Rob McCubbin and Victoria. Ministry of Education
brief_description: Presents a classroom view of cooperative learning highlighting the key aspects of successful implementation. It is based on the experiences of four teachers showing cooperative learning at different stages of use in their classrooms.
creator_credit_for_label: Rob McCubbin and Victoria. Ministry of Education
